title: I saw this digital manicure change color in seconds at CES 2026 - and you can order it now
contentSnippet: iPolish, a set of acrylic nails that change color digitally, lets you choose from over 400 nail polish colors at the touch of a button. It was nominated for a Best of CES award.
content: iPolish, a set of acrylic nails that change color digitally, lets you choose from over 400 nail polish colors at the touch of a button. It was nominated for a Best of CES award.
